meanings.definition: To touch or handle (something) incorrectly or inappropriately.
meanings.sent1: She mistouches the fragile vase and it falls to the ground.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to mistouch the hot stove with your bare hands.
meanings.sent3: He mistouched the painting, thinking it was a touch screen.
meanings.sent4: Her mistouch on the piano keys created a discordant sound.
meanings.sent5: The warning label reminded him not to mistouch the electrical wires.

meanings.definition: A mistake or error in touching or handling something.
meanings.sent1: The mistouch of the button caused the machine to malfunction.
meanings.sent2: She realized her mistouch when the sculpture broke into pieces.
meanings.sent3: His mistouch of the remote control changed the channel unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The mistouch on the touchpad led to an unintended selection.
meanings.sent5: The artist's mistouch on the canvas left a visible smudge.
